mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(grant_date, '%Y-%m') AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM jbx_product_grant WHERE deleted = 'n' AND workspace_id = #{workspaceId} AND grant_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(grant_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY name
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jbx_product_grant WHERE grant_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01') AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-12-31') AND deleted = 'n' AND workspace_id = #{workspaceId}
